titles.title: 057 O Worship The King, All Glorious Above

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
E
Oh, worship the King,
All glorious above,
Oh, gratefully sing
His power and His love.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Our Shield and Defender,
The Ancient of Days,
Pavilioned in splendor
And girded with praise.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Oh, tell of His might,
Oh, sing of His grace
Whose robe is the light,
Whose canopy space.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
His chariots of wrath
The deep Thunderclouds form
And dark is His path
On the wings
Of the storm.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Thy bountiful care
What tongue Can recite?
It breathes in the air,
It shines in the light.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
It streams from The hills,
It descends to the plain
And sweetly distills
In the dew and The rain.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Frail children of dust
And feeble as frail
In Thee do we trust,
Nor find Thee to fail.

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Thy mercies how Tender,
How firm to the end,
Our Maker, Defender,
Redeemer, and Friend.
